channel.title: Calender program
channel.description: I currently use microsoft Outlook to plan everything, it's actually pretty good but there is problems I have with it. Basically the use-ability is just a bit shit, does anyone have any alternatives? ty

item.title: Calender program
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’m using the 2007 outlook. Right I installed thunderbird and the lightning addon, but importing my calander from Outlook to thunderbird doesn’t work.

I export from outlook to a comma seperated file, then try to import in thunderbird but nothing happens when I do import. Hmph.

Read full topic

item.title: Calender program
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yeh, im actually interested in a good one too. Not anything for e-mails though, I’d prefer an actual decent calender program that is good for organizing shiz.

Read full topic

item.title: Calender program
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Pretty sure Thunderbird can do this. Google also has a calendar app with Gmail.
What version of Outlook are you using? The 2007 one is somewhat better than 2003.
